review.title: “A very nice place to work if you want long term stability.”
review.pros: Pros – Family like atmosphere. They are flexible with how you take time off. Great year end bonuses.
review.cons: Cons – No career path for employees to aspire to. This is the only con. If you want to see yourself grow as an individual this is not the place to work. If you just want a nice job with nice people then you would find a perfect fit.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Offer staff development opportunities. Encourage employees to take classes.
